author: bencomic

right.text: you can go to #dragonweyr on esper and try to appeal

left.text: Rumor has it he's corrupt. Normally I wouldn't even SAY that because i'd be afraid he was logging it, But we've got blocking filters in #rawr

right.text: It's worked for some of us before... like that time with the Great Marklu Hack Attack. Go to #dragonweyr dude. It's your only hope.

left.text: Go to espernet, and go to #dragonweyr, and appeal. If you do that he'll know you're REALLY sorry, and maybe he'll drop charges.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 48 - The Last One
